title: ArtyTorrent 103-Misc Guitar Loops 1-WAV samples
description:
ArtyTorrent 103-Misc Guitar Loops 1-WAV samples
-----------------------------------------------

As requested, here is a pack of guitar loops, divided into three categories. 
The sound of the guitar will always be popular, so there is something here for just about every genre of music. There&#039;s some slow acoustic picking for hip hop and RnB, clean strumming and bluesy riffs for indie-rock, plus some all-out distorted solos for industrial, metal or big beat. The best thing to do, as always, is experiment.
A future pack dedicated solely to wah-wah and funky disco riffs will be compiled in the not too distant future, so look out for that.

Torrent contains 3 RARs with 186 loops
--------------------------------------
Misc Acoustic Guitar Loops (45)
Misc Amped Guitar Loops (79)
Misc Clean Electrics (62)

These samples are from various sources that I got so long ago I can&#039;t even remember. You&#039;ve probably already a got a few of these if you&#039;ve been torrenting for a while, but my pack is special because I&#039;ve renamed all files to include root key note information where known, included the tempo, and acidized the samples to make pitchshifting easy.

All files are normalized 16-bit WAVs at 44.1KHz.
 
--
Arty - "No roadies required"
6th March 2008


P.S. This will be my last torrent for a week or so, so have fun with what you&#039;ve already got and KEEP SEEDING! :D
Back soon...
